name: The Beach (Janku)
description: You begin your short life as a little sand-man. You have one purpose in life - bringing back little boy's lost toy. In order to do this, you will build sand-structures with collected molds and gather sand along the way. You will grow big, strong and fast. But watch out for crabs! They will hit you and you will lose your sand! When you collect all the molds, you will have to build a sand-castle - big enough to climb the top of the cliff and bring back the boy's toy. Be wary and hurry. A big wave that will destroy all your constructs and take back the toy into the depths of the sea IS COMING!!!
